meanings.definition: To be worthy of something due to one's actions or qualities.
meanings.sent1: She worked hard and studied diligently, so she did deserve the award.
meanings.sent2: He helped his friend without expecting anything in return, showing he truly deserved the recognition.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it deserved all the treats in the world for catching a tiny bug.
meanings.sent4: The old tree, standing tall and proud, seemed to deserve the admiration of all who passed by.
meanings.sent5: The brave firefighter's heroic actions truly deserved the gratitude of the entire community.

meanings.definition: To have earned something through one's behavior or actions.
meanings.sent1: After completing the marathon, she felt she did deserve the shiny medal.
meanings.sent2: He knew he deserved the promotion after putting in extra hours and exceeding expectations.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy thought it deserved a treat for chewing on the shoe.
meanings.sent4: The artist's masterpiece deserved to be displayed in the most prestigious gallery.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated teacher truly deserved the heartfelt thanks from her students for all her hard work.
